title: Fox News cameraman Pierre Zakrzewski killed in same Ukraine attack that wounded correspondent Benjamin Hall, network says
content:
1. Fox News cameraman Pierre Zakrzewski killed in same Ukraine attack that wounded correspondent Benjamin Hall, network says  CBS News
  2. Fox News correspondent hospitalized after being injured in Ukraine  CNN
  3. FOX correspondent injured covering Ukraine war  FOX 11 Los Angeles
  4. A Fox News correspondent is seriously injured in Ukraine — while Russian memos praise Tucker Carlson  The Independent
  5. Fox News journalist Benjamin Hall injured covering Ukraine war  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: Fox News のカメラマン Pierre Zakrzewski が、Benjamin Hall 特派員を負傷させたのと同じウクライナの攻撃で死亡したとネットワークが発表した。
新闻网说，福克斯新闻摄影师皮埃尔-扎克泽夫斯基在造成记者本杰明-霍尔受伤的同一次乌克兰袭击中丧生
新聞網說，福克斯新聞攝影師皮埃爾-扎克澤夫斯基在造成記者本傑明-霍爾受傷的同一次烏克蘭襲擊中喪生
